id: Spirited Away FREE Notion Template and Digital Planner
name: Spirited Away FREE Notion Template and Digital Planner
description: FREE Spirited Away Notion Template.This cute template is for all of my Studio Ghibli fans out there. Duplicate this into your Notion workspace and use to organize your daily and weekly tasks, write daily affirmations, manage goals, set reminders etc.I've also included a budget template and habit tracker as a bonus! I like for these to be accessible but the cost of living is sky high and I am a neurodivergent mother to a neurodivergent son so donations are always welcome!Feel free to contact me a
